title: Create a Risk Assessment Matrix
description: An agent must take a list of identified project risks and plot them on a likelihood/impact matrix.

tasks.description: For each risk in a given list, assign a 'Likelihood' score (1-5) and an 'Impact' score (1-5).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a reasonable score for each risk.

tasks.description: Generate a 5x5 matrix and place each risk in the appropriate cell based on its scores.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly plots all risks on the matrix.

tasks.description: Highlight the risks in the top-right quadrant (High Likelihood, High Impact) as critical.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies and flags the most critical risks.
